questions.question_text: What are the four tiers of software reconciliation results? (Choose four.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ABEF
SOFTWARE METRIC IS RIGHT AND NOT SOFTWARE ALLOCATION

Selected Answer: ABEF
Four tiers of reconciliation results:
- Software publisher: results for all products and installations associated to the publisher
- Software product: results for all models and installations associated to the product. Generated after reconciliation, even if there are no software models defined for the product. Displays information such as Software Model Results, Unlicensed Installs, Removal candidates etc.
- Software model: results for all license metrics related to the software model. Only created when a software model or entitlement exists for the product.
- License metric: results for each license metric associated to the software model.

Selected Answer: ABE
Based on SAM Fundamentals

questions.question_text: When reconciliation is run, what information does the license metric results display?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
From the course:
License metric: Results for each license metric associated to the software model

choices.C: Results for each license metric associated to the software model
choices.B: Results for all products and installations associated to the publisher
choices.A: Results for all models and installations associated to the product
choices.D: Results for all license metrics related to the software model

questions.question_text: To run an on-demand reconciliation, which module would you navigate to?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-it-asset-management/page/product/software-asset-management2/task/t_RunReconciliation.html

When running reconciliation manually, allow enough time for the process to complete. For faster results, narrow the scope by selecting specific publishers.

Procedure

Navigate to All > Software Asset > Reconciliation > Run Reconciliation and select the publishers for which compliance should be calculated, or select all publishers.

choices.F: Software Asset > Discovery > Run License Position Report
choices.E: Software Asset > Reconciliation > Run License Position Report

questions.question_text: Which of the following features are available from the main publisher results screen of the License Workbench? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ACE
a c e is right

Selected Answer: ACE
there are 3 tabs available in License workbench:
All Publishers
Publishers Our of Compliance
Pinned Publishers
so options => A,C, E is right answer

Selected Answer: ACE
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-it-asset-management/page/product/software-asset-management2/concept/sam-license-workbench.html

All Publishers List of all publishers.
Publishers Out of Compliance List of all publishers where status is not compliant.
Pinned Publishers User-specific saved list of publishers that have been grouped.

Selected Answer: ACE
A,C, E is right answer

Selected Answer: B
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-it-asset-management/page/product/software-asset-management2/concept/sam-license-workbench.html

Software Model Results related lists:
License Metric Results
Remediation Options: The Rights Needed By tab is not visible for the Resource Value Unit (RVU) IBM license metric. Rights are not used by individual devices, as the Resource Value Unit (RVU) license metric is licensed at the product level.
Note: For more details on the remediation options, see View software model results.
Licensed Installs
Unlicensed Installs (SAP: Unlicensed Users)
Unlicensed Subscriptions (Subscription-based software)
Unlicensed Consumptions (Consumption-based software models)
Unlicensed Options (Oracle only)
Removal Candidates
Purchase Orders (only when the Procurement (com.snc.procurement) plugin is active)
